definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: likeness, form;—´[[ת]] Ex 20:4 + 4 t.; cstr. [[תְּמוּנַת]] ([[תְּמֻנַת]]) De 4:16 + 3 t.; sf. [[תְּמוּנׇתְֶָ]] Ps 17:15; —likeness, representation (‖[[פֶּסֶל]]) Ex 20:4 = De 5:8, cf. De 4:16, De 4:23, De 4:25; form, semblance of ´[[י]] Nu 12:8, Ps 17:15, cf. De 4:12 (vid. Dr), v:De 4:15; of nocturnal apparition Job 4:16.
